item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
I was hoping to spent a little time with my man doing something romantic in WoW (do not read: cyber tyvm), as we can't be together due to a few hundred miles but he can't make it, so maybe I'll just swan about and complete that quest for a change..
bah humbug.
Also a friend of mine is cooking his girlfriend dinner, nothing unusual there, but I'm making his menu for him... WoW stylee, should be good!
item.content:encoded:
I was hoping to spent a little time with my man doing something romantic in WoW (do not read: cyber tyvm), as we can’t be together due to a few hundred miles but he can’t make it, so maybe I’ll just swan about and complete that quest for a change..

bah humbug.

Also a friend of mine is cooking his girlfriend dinner, nothing unusual there, but I’m making his menu for him… WoW stylee, should be good!
